abstract: The Disney Dual Screen Mobile DVD Player can simultaneously display a movie or video game on two 7-inch screens.
snippet: The Disney Dual Screen Mobile DVD Player can simultaneously display a movie or video game on two 7-inch screens.
lead_paragraph: Nothing beats a portable DVD player for a long trip — except perhaps one with two screens. Designed for those with more than one child, the Disney Dual Screen Mobile DVD Player can simultaneously display a movie or video game on two 7-inch screens.

headline.main: A Dual-Screen DVD Player, Suited to Separating Feuding Children
headline.print_headline: A Dual-Screen DVD Player, Suited to Separating Feuding Children
